About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio

I am a flexible person who takes initiative, new challenges in which I can grow give me a lot of energy. I am a curious person who is always looking for new information to strengthen my professional and personal life. I am resistant to stress, someone who can handle work independently, can deliver efficient and user-friendly results. Bringing a challenge in a team to a good end brings the best in me. I think along with the customers to realize their wishes.

Frontend developer

Everything on the front is built with a mix of HTML, CSS and clientside scripts such as JavaScript the core elements of frontend development. The frontend developer bridges the world of design and technology, brings design to life and packages the usability of the back in a modern, inviting way for users to work with.

front-end web developer’s services

  • Tailoring user experience
  • Bringing a designer’s concept to life with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Production, modification, and maintenance of websites and web application user interfaces
  • Creating tools that enhance how users see and interact with your site in any browser

Backend developer

Backend developers create and maintain the entire backend functions. The backend developer takes finished frontend code and gives it working functionality for instance, making values in a drop-down menu possible by building the infrastructure that pulls values from the database.

responsibilities of the back end can include

  • API integration
  • Security settings and hack prevents
  • Reporting generating analytics and statistics like system reports of server load, number of visitors, geography of visitors, etc.
  • Backup and restore technologies for website’s files and DB.
